title: Ticket #6263: Parent ticket: various splice improvements
description:
I wanted to create a parent ticket for a bunch of the possible splice enhancements, because they should probably be thought about together (since the implementation method for one feature may significantly affect others).

Anyhow, here are a bunch of splice-related possible improvements:

  • #3587: Add "socket" nodes for splices
  • #6262: Parse splices lazily
  • #6048: Have separate Dag objects for splices?
  • #2980: RFC: Unify SPLICE and SUBDAG EXTERNAL in DAGman
  • #4824: Should DIR for splices work the same as for sub-DAGs?
  • #5653: Add per-splice DAG throttling
